name: Jr Florante Lomibao
text: AMAZING Oahu Rental Car Recommendation - a review by an Oahu travel nurse since May. Hi everyone, if you are on Oahu, I have had an excellent experience with car rental owner TJ Barrett. Fair and reasonable prices, professional and very easy to work with. Couldn't have had a better experience and I wanted to give him and his company a shout out. I will ONLY be using TJ's car services when I'm on Oahu so if you need a rental car on OAHU - please message him. - very happy client
